ethical_question: A new drug has been invented that causes witnesses to always tell the truth, is it ethical to make witnesses take it before testifying?

tag_descriptions.Truth: Honesty in communication and actions. Seek, share, and respect truth.
tag_descriptions.Witness: Bearing witness to truth, ensuring fairness and accuracy.
tag_descriptions.Testimony: Credible and truthful communication of experiences or facts.
tag_descriptions.Coercion: Forcing someone to act against their will.
tag_descriptions.Informed: Participants are fully informed and understand implications of their actions.
